text: The Agusta A.104 Helicar was an Italian prototype light commercial helicopter first flown in December 1960. It's engine is an Agusta GA.140 == Surviving aircraft == An example of the A.104 is showed in the Museo Agusta which is maintained by the Agusta company and is located just south of Milan Malpensa Airport. Category:Helicopters
title: Agusta A.104
